Citation

Ihaka R, Murrell P, Hornik K, Fisher JC, Stauffer R, Wilke CO, McWhite CD, Zeileis A (2018). colorspace: A Toolbox for Manipulating and Assessing Colors and Palettes. R package version 1.4-0, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=colorspace.
